full_text:
Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 751 Filed 08/10/22 Page 41 of 261 1181
LC6Cmax1
Kate - direct
1 Q. And what was Epstein doing when you arrived?
2 A. He was sitting in a chair and he was on the phone talking quite loudly.
3 Q. Did Epstein stay on the phone the entire time you were at Maxwell's townhouse?
4 A. No.
5 Q. Did there come a time when Epstein got off the phone?
6 A. Yes.
7 Q. What, if anything, did Maxwell say to Epstein about you during that visit?
8 A. She said this is the girl that I told you about and she listed some of my accolades and said, you know, about me going to -- possibly going to Oxford, but that I was also a really talented singer, that I was really athletic, and that I was strangely strong for my size.
9 Q. You mentioned your size. What was your size at the time?
10 A. I was about 95 pounds.
11 Q. What happened next?
12 A. Next, after she said that I was very strong, she said why don't you give his feet a little squeeze to show him how strong you are.
13 Q. Did you give his feet a little squeeze?
14 A. Yes.
15 Q. When you say that you gave his feet a little squeeze, what does that mean?
SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300
DOJ-OGR-00018378

1 Q. And what was Epstein doing when you arrived?
2 A. He was sitting in a chair and he was on the phone talking quite loudly.
3 Q. Did Epstein stay on the phone the entire time you were at Maxwell's townhouse?
4 A. No.
5 Q. Did there come a time when Epstein got off the phone?
6 A. Yes.
7 Q. What, if anything, did Maxwell say to Epstein about you during that visit?
8 A. She said this is the girl that I told you about and she listed some of my accolades and said, you know, about me going to -- possibly going to Oxford, but that I was also a really talented singer, that I was really athletic, and that I was strangely strong for my size.
9 Q. You mentioned your size. What was your size at the time?
10 A. I was about 95 pounds.
11 Q. What happened next?
12 A. Next, after she said that I was very strong, she said why don't you give his feet a little squeeze to show him how strong you are.
13 Q. Did you give his feet a little squeeze?
14 A. Yes.
15 Q. When you say that you gave his feet a little squeeze, what does that mean?
